countries.instrumentTitle: National Autism Innovation Strategy (policy, non-statutory)
countries.summary: Ireland has a national policy strategy on autism but no dedicated Autism Act. Rights and duties flow primarily from general equality, education and disability law; parts of the EPSEN Act 2004 remain uncommenced.

countries.instrumentTitle: Autism Act 2009
countries.summary: First disability-specific Act in England creating statutory duties on the Secretary of State and guidance duties on local authorities and NHS bodies for adult autism services.

countries.instrumentTitle: Autism Act (Northern Ireland) 2011
countries.summary: Places duties on departments to prepare, implement and review an autism strategy; recognises autism as a disability for the purposes of the Disability Discrimination Act 1995.

countries.instrumentTitle: Autism Code of Practice for Wales (statutory guidance)
countries.summary: Statutory Code of Practice under Welsh social services law placing duties on local authorities and health boards regarding autism support and planning.

countries.instrumentTitle: Scottish Strategy for Autism (policy)
countries.summary: National strategy and subsequent delivery plans; duties derive from general equality, education and social care legislation rather than an autism-specific act.

countries.instrumentTitle: Law 134/2015 (Provisions on autism spectrum disorders)
countries.summary: Establishes principles for care and social inclusion of people with autism; mandates guidelines and regional planning; recognises autism within essential levels of care.

countries.instrumentTitle: Persons within the Autism Spectrum (Empowerment) Act
countries.summary: Rights-focused act providing for an Autism Advisory Council, action plans, and obligations on public bodies to promote inclusion and reasonable accommodation.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Strategy for Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders 2023–2027
countries.summary: Comprehensive policy strategy with investment in diagnosis, education and inclusion; not an autism-specific statute. Legal duties flow from general disability law (Code de l’action sociale et des familles) and EU-derived obligations.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Strategy on Autism (policy)
countries.summary: Policy framework on autism; enforceable rights derive from general disability equality and education law and EU obligations.

countries.instrumentTitle: Law No. 12.764/2012 (Berenice Piana Law)
countries.summary: Defines autism as a disability for all legal purposes and establishes rights to health, education, social inclusion and protection from discrimination; provides penalties for violations.

countries.instrumentTitle: Autism CARES Act (funding, coordination); ADA & IDEA (rights)
countries.summary: Autism CARES authorises autism research and services funding. Enforceable rights stem from the ADA (nondiscrimination, reasonable accommodation) and IDEA (special education).

countries.instrumentTitle: National Autism Strategy (policy)
countries.summary: Commonwealth strategy sets priorities across health, education and employment. Enforceable rights derive from the Disability Discrimination Act 1992 and NDIS Act.

countries.instrumentTitle: New Zealand Autism Spectrum Disorder Guideline (policy)
countries.summary: Clinical and service guidance; enforceable rights derive from the Human Rights Act 1993 and disability strategy frameworks.

countries.instrumentTitle: National/Regional plans (policy); Federal Participation Act (general)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act; rights flow from general disability law (Bundesteilhabegesetz) and Länder plans.

countries.instrumentTitle: Action plans (policy); General Equal Treatment Act
countries.summary: No autism-specific statute; general equality and disability policy apply.

countries.instrumentTitle: National disability strategies (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified; general disability legislation and EU obligations apply.

countries.instrumentTitle: Discrimination Act; disability policy (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: General disability rights; autism addressed through health and education policy.

countries.instrumentTitle: Anti-discrimination and disability policy (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: Autism addressed via general disability and education systems.

countries.instrumentTitle: Equality and Anti-Discrimination Act (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: General disability rights; autism addressed through services guidance.

countries.instrumentTitle: Strategy for Persons with Disabilities 2021–2030 (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act; general disability strategy and education law apply.

countries.instrumentTitle: Regional strategies; anti-discrimination laws (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: Autism addressed via community/region policies and general equality law.

countries.instrumentTitle: Disability Equality Act; Länder plans (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: General disability rights; autism addressed via health and education policy.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Action Plan for the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act; general disability action plan applies.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Strategy on Rights of Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: People with Disabilities Act; strategies (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: General disability rights; autism addressed via policy.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Plan for the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act; general framework applies.

countries.instrumentTitle: Strategy for Integration of Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Equalisation of Opportunities for Persons with Disabilities Act; strategies
countries.summary: General disability rights; autism addressed via policy.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Strategy for Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Act on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities; strategies
countries.summary: General disability law; no autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Non-Discrimination Act; Disability Services Act (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: Autism covered via general disability rights and services.

countries.instrumentTitle: Welfare Development Plan; Equal Treatment Act
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Guidelines for Equal Opportunities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific statute identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Programme for Social Integration of Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific statute identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Disability policy strategies (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: General disability frameworks apply.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Plan for the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Act on Services for Persons with Disabilities; strategies
countries.summary: No autism-specific statute identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Disability Discrimination Act; cantonal plans (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: Autism addressed via general disability protections.

countries.instrumentTitle: Law on Disabled Persons; strategies (no autism-specific act)
countries.summary: General disability frameworks apply; ECtHR case law on accessibility obligations relevant.

countries.instrumentTitle: National Strategy for Barrier-Free Environment (policy)
countries.summary: General disability strategies; no autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Law on Prevention of Discrimination Against Persons with Disabilities; strategies
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Entity-level disability strategies (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific national act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Strategy for Equal Rights of Persons with Disabilities (policy)
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Law on Prohibition of Discrimination Against Persons with Disabilities; strategies
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Law on Inclusion and Accessibility of Persons with Disabilities; strategies
countries.summary: No autism-specific act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Persons with Disability Act, 2006 (general)
countries.summary: General disability rights; no autism-specific national act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Persons with Disabilities Act, 2003 (general)
countries.summary: General disability rights; no autism-specific national act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Discrimination Against Persons with Disabilities (Prohibition) Act, 2018 (general)
countries.summary: General disability rights; autism-specific policy is emerging but no national autism act identified.

countries.instrumentTitle: Promotion of Equality Act; White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (general)
countries.summary: General disability rights; no autism-specific national act identified.
